verbose_text: The expression level of Bcl-2 (1.594 +/-0.2966 vs. 0.6756 +/-0.06635; MD 0.9180 +/-0.3039; 95% CI 0.07424-1.762; P = 0.0392) and the Bcl-2 / Bax ratio (0.7715 +/-0.06642 vs. 0.2418 +/-0.02536; MD 0.5297 +/-0.07110; 95% CI 0.3323-0.7271; P = 0.0017) were significantly increased in the treated group compared to the untreated group (XREF_FIG).
